# The `TaggedScalarTraits` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class should be specialized by type that requires custom conversion to/from a YAML scalar with optional tags. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class should be specialized by type that requires custom conversion to/from a YAML scalar with optional tags.

For example:

template &lt;&gt; struct <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/yaml/taggedscalartraits">TaggedScalarTraits&lt;MyType&gt;</a> &#123; static void output(const MyType &amp;Value, void&#42;, llvm::raw&#95;ostream
     &amp;ScalarOut, llvm::raw&#95;ostream &amp;TagOut) &#123; // stream out custom formatting including optional Tag Out &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>; &#125; static <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> input(StringRef Scalar, StringRef Tag, void&#42;, MyType
     &amp;Value) &#123; // parse scalar and set <code>value</code> // return empty string on success, or error string return StringRef(); &#125; static <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/yaml/#a2e9b09c50b4fff3bad8cba23daef8757">QuotingType</a> mustQuote(const MyType &amp;Value, StringRef) &#123; return <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/yaml/#a2e9b09c50b4fff3bad8cba23daef8757a66ba162102bbf6ae31b522aec561735e">QuotingType::Single</a>; &#125; &#125;;

Definition at line 216 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/yamltraits-h">YAMLTraits.h</a>.
